body:
```
$ spack spec ecp-proxy-apps
Input spec
--------------------------------
ecp-proxy-apps

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Multiple providers found for 'jpeg': ['libjpeg', 'libjpeg-turbo@1.5.90%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-gentoo2-x86_64']
```
then
```
$ spack spec ecp-proxy-apps ^libjpeg-turbo
Input spec
--------------------------------
ecp-proxy-apps
    ^libjpeg-turbo

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: ecp-proxy-apps does not depend on libjpeg-turbo
```

@adamjstewart  any idea?
title: Cannot concretize ecp-proxy-apps
